data.title: Austria Set to Pick Economy Minister Kocher to Fill Holzmann’s ECB Seat
data.meta_description: Austria is set to name Economy Minister Martin Kocher as its next central bank chief in the coming weeks, according to people familiar with the matter.
data.text:
New OeNB chief to succeed Holzmann in September 2025

Three other board appointments may hint at future power deal

Austria is set to name Economy Minister Martin Kocher as its next central bank chief in the coming weeks, according to people familiar with the matter.

The steps to appoint him as Austrian National Bank governor are almost finished, as part of an early selection process before Sept. 29 elections, said the people, who spoke on the condition of anonymity because the plans are private. He would begin in September 2025 after Robert Holzmann ’s term ends.
